message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $15,000. I believe it holds significant value and could greatly benefit you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.

I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While I value your offer, the product is worth significantly more to me. I'm willing to come down to $13,000. I believe this price reflects the true value of the product.

I appreciate your willingness to come down to $13,000, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway from $13,000, so I'd like to offer $11,000. I think this is a fair price for the product.
